sentences.en: A young virtuoso cornet player named Louis Armstrong was discovered in New Orleans by King Oliver.
sentences.cn: 在新奥尔良一位名为路易?阿姆斯特朗的年轻小号手被金?奥列佛发现.

sentences.en: And in time Paganini resumed his career as a touring virtuoso.
sentences.cn: 帕格尼尼终于重操他的巡回演奏的旧业.

sentences.en: But what actually killed the great virtuoso?
sentences.cn: 但是究竟是什么杀死了这位伟大的音乐家 呢 ?

sentences.en: England's football fans were hoping for a virtuoso performance against Cameroon.
sentences.cn: 英格兰队的球迷期待着该队与喀麦隆队能够上演一场精彩对决。

sentences.en: EXMP: the politician is known a virtuoso at public relations.
sentences.cn: 这位政客是著名的公共关系专家.

sentences.en: Grand master of provocation, virtuoso of the eccentric, Salvador Dali is known the world over.
sentences.cn: 大师的挑衅, 是偏心, 萨尔瓦多达利是已知的世界各地的演奏家.

sentences.en: He a virtuoso at every endeavour.
sentences.cn: 他是个非常努力的艺术品鉴赏家.

sentences.en: He was gaining a reputation as a remarkable virtuoso.
sentences.cn: 作为一位技艺非凡的大师，他声誉日隆。

sentences.en: His handling of the meeting was quite a virtuoso performance.
sentences.cn: 他掌握会议可真有一套.

sentences.en: In time Paganini resumed his career as a touring virtuoso.
sentences.cn: 帕格尼尼终于重操他那巡回演奏的旧业.

sentences.en: In today's super - competitive elite applicant pools, just about everyone has virtuoso numbers.
sentences.cn: 在今天的超级竞争力的精英申请人泳池, 只是每个人都有演奏家号码.

sentences.en: Liu Fang is a remarkable virtuoso of the pipa, a Chinese lute.
sentences.cn: 刘芳是一位出色的演奏家.

sentences.en: Ma Xiaohui is a virtuoso on the erhu.
sentences.cn: 马晓辉是一名二胡演奏大师.

sentences.en: They are virtuoso boxers, master technicians, certainly among the best of their eras.
sentences.cn: 他们都是拳击艺术家 、 技术大师, 无愧为所满清ii之 赤裸凌迟属时代的佼佼者.

sentences.en: Xia majored in Guzheng performance at Nanjing Normal University under Guzheng virtuoso, Professor Yan Ai Hua.
sentences.cn: 进入南京师范大学后随著名演奏家阎爱华、涂咏梅教授主修古筝.

words.tran_cn: 精湛技巧；对艺术品的爱好；艺术爱好者

trans.tran_cn: 艺术爱好者（或鉴赏家）的，行家里手的，行家的
艺术大师，演奏能手，名家，艺术名家，学者，古董收藏家
trans.tran_en: someone who is a very skilful performer, especially in music
